price: 18. Waxaanu u sakhirnay buuraha inay kula tasbiixsadaan (Alle) ammaan iyo mahdin galab dhaca iyo qorrax soo baxaba.
arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرۡنَا ٱلۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِشۡرَاقِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā sakharnā al-jibāla maʿahu yusabbiḥ'na bil-ʿashiyi wal-ish'rāqi
